project_context.visual_mood: Dark Mode, High Contrast, Electric Accents

typography.instructions: Use Manrope for all UI text. Use JetBrains Mono for ALL financial data, stock prices, and percentages. Headings must be tight.

colors.instructions: Implement a strict Dark Mode. Backgrounds are deep charcoal (#0B0F13), NOT pure black. Cards are slightly lighter (#121417). Use Neon Green (#00E599) for primary actions and positive trends. Use Red (#EF4444) for negative trends. Use Amber (#F59E0B) for warnings or dividends.

layout.instructions: Use a dense grid for the dashboard. Summary cards at the top (col-span-1), Main Chart in the middle (col-span-2 or 3), Feed/List on the side. Use 'gap-4' or 'gap-6'. Ensure every pixel is utilized.

cards.style: Flat background (#121417), 1px subtle border (border-border), no shadow by default.
cards.hover: Slight lift (-translate-y-1), subtle shadow (shadow-lg), border color lightens.

inputs.style: bg-input/50 border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary placeholder:text-muted-foreground

charts.style: Minimalist. Hide axis lines if possible. Use tooltips with dark backgrounds and neon text.

tables.style: Compact. Row hover effects (bg-muted/50). Mono font for numeric columns.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use for sticky headers and overlays: bg-background/70 backdrop-blur-xl border-b border-white/5.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle radial gradients behind hero charts to create depth.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 1px borders with low opacity (border-white/10) to define structure without clutter.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use colored shadows for primary actions (e.g., green shadow for green buttons).

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the Dark Mode theme immediately in tailwind.config.js and index.css.
Use 'Manrope' for all UI text and 'JetBrains Mono' for all numbers/financial data.
Create a 'DashboardLayout' component that uses the 'Control Room' grid strategy.
Use Recharts for all data visualization. Style them to match the neon palette.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states and transitions.
Use the provided image URLs for backgrounds or user avatars where appropriate.
Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds, use solid deep charcoal (#0B0F13).
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
